original_title: ジョーカーゲーム　脱出
overview: Set several days after "Joker Game".  7 girls, who lost in a game, are gathered at a correctional institution. The girls must now participate in "Escape Game of Death". The 7 girls, who are locked in a room, have to find hidden clues and must cooperate with one another to escape. Because of a trap, the first victim comes out…
title: Joker Game: Escape
